package faketestapp.faketestapp.maindir.subdir;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;

import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.testcasejavatemplate.TestCaseTemplateParent;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.helper.faketestapp.FakeLanguageTemplatesContainer;

/**
 * Executable Example for TestApplication 'FakeTestApp'.
 * Autogenerated by SysNatTesting.
 */
public class FakeTestCaseTest extends TestCaseTemplateParent
{
	protected FakeLanguageTemplatesContainer fakeLanguageTemplatesContainer;

	@Before
	public void setUp()
	{
		super.setUp();
		fakeLanguageTemplatesContainer = new FakeLanguageTemplatesContainer(this);
	}

	@After
	public void shutdown()
	{
		if ( ! isSkipped() && executionInfo.isApplicationStarted()) {
			if (languageTemplatesCommon != null) languageTemplatesCommon.gotoStartPage();
		}
		fakeLanguageTemplatesContainer = null;
		super.shutdown();
	}

	@Test
	@Override
	public void executeTestCase()
	{
		try {
			fakeLanguageTemplatesContainer.startNewXX("test");
			
			closeCurrentTestCaseWithSuccess();
		} catch (Throwable e) {
			super.handleThrowable(e);
		}
	}
}
